ValueDomain.preferredName: Exposure as Collected Name of Treatment Clinical Study Sponsor Defined Name
ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The literal identifier of the exposure as collected._An entity such as an individual, company, institution, group, or organization which takes responsibility for the initiation, management, and/or financing of a clinical study. The sponsor does not actually conduct the investigation unless the sponsor is a sponsor-investigator. A person other than an individual (e.g., corporation or agency) that uses one or more of its own employees to conduct research it has initiated is considered to be a sponsor, and the employees are considered to be investigators. [21 CFR P.50.3(k)] [21 CFR P.50.102(j)] [21 CFR P.312.3]_Clearly characterized or delimited._The words or language units by which a thing is known.

An entity such as an individual, company, institution, group, or organization which takes responsibility for the initiation, management, and/or financing of a clinical study. The sponsor does not actually conduct the investigation unless the sponsor is a sponsor-investigator. A person other than an individual (e.g., corporation or agency) that uses one or more of its own employees to conduct research it has initiated is considered to be a sponsor, and the employees are considered to be investigators. [21 CFR P.50.3(k)] [21 CFR P.50.102(j)] [21 CFR P.312.3]

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the study treatment
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the study treatment name?

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: ECTRT is the name of the intervention or treatment known to the subject and/or administrator and it is the SDTM topic variable. It is a required variable in SDTM and must have a value in CDASH or a plan to populate it in the SDTM submission datasets (i.e. collected or populated from other sources). In a masked study, if treatment is collected and known as Tablet A to the subject or administrator, then ECTRT='TABLET A'. If in a masked study the treatment is not known by a synonym and the data are to be exchanged between sponsors, partners and/or regulatory agency(s), then assign ECTRT the value of 'MASKED'.

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECTRT
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable.
